replies.msg: line你老母

其實而家有polyu msc in operation research and risk analysis offer , course list 如下， 但驚讀完都係黑食， 想問讀呢個好定讀second degree engine (ME/ EE)好， poly master 讀1年半，second degree engine 讀兩年半

Polyu msc in operation research and risk analysis Compulsory :
Operation research methods
Advanced operation research methods
Probability and stochastic models ( SOA related :exam P)
Principle of risk analysis
Simulation and risk analysis
Business forecasting
Financial modelling

Elective course( at least 3 course , can be more than 3)

Optimization methods
Scheduling
Statistical inference
Scientific computing
Mathematics of finance (soa related: exam FM)
Investment science (soa related: exam MFE
Mathematics of derivative pricing (soa related :exam MFE)
Loss model
Multi criteria optimization
Risk analysis of epidemics
Statistical data mining
Stochastic optimization
Supply chain analysis
Principle of coporate finance
Coporate risk management
Economics for financial analysis
Supply chain management
Pish

quote.msg: 讀土木工程啦

replies.msg:
讀咩土木呀？
大家都全球貿易戰全面開打
香港經濟會越來越差 暫時不會 不過1，2年後就會浮現 今日恆指跌到仆街

如果經濟差 基建項目就會被拖累
基建少左 土木，建造業就會首當期衝
今次情況被沙士當年更加仆街
Pish
